<S%G3759>Woe<s%> unto the <S%G2889>world<s%> because <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G4625>offences<s%>! <S%G1063>for<s%> it must <S%G318>needs<s%> <S%G2076>be<s%> that <S%G4625>offences<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>; <S%G4133>but<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> to that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1565>by<s%> <S%G1223>whom<s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G4625>offence<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%>!

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G622>lost<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> if <S%G1437>so<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> that he <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754><s%>, he <S%G5463>rejoiceth<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G846>that<s%> sheep, <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> the ninety and <S%G1768>nine<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4105>went<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4105>astray<s%>.

Even <S%G3779>so<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> <S%G1715>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> little <S%G3398>ones<s%> should <S%G622>perish<s%>.

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> shall <S%G264>trespass<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1651>tell<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> his <S%G1651>fault<s%> <S%G3342>between<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>: <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, thou hast <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3362>if<s%> he <S%G191>will<s%> <S%G3362>not<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> thee, then <S%G3880>take<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> may be <S%G2476>established<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall neglect to <S%G3878>hear<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2036>tell<s%> it unto the <S%G1577>church<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he neglect to <S%G3878>hear<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>, let him <S%G2077>be<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> an heathen <S%G1482>man<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5057>publican<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G2193>Until<s%> seven <S%G2034>times<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%>, <S%G2193>Until<s%> seventy <S%G1441>times<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%>.

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3666>likened<s%> unto a <S%G444>certain<s%> <S%G935>king<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G4868>take<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> <S%G3326>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G756>begun<s%> to <S%G4868>reckon<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> was <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, which <S%G3781>owed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> ten <S%G3463>thousand<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%>. talents: a talent is 750. ounces of silver, which after five shillings the ounce is 187. li. 10. s.

But forasmuch <S%G1161>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G591>pay<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be <S%G4097>sold<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3745>that<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> payment to be <S%G591>made<s%>.

The <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> fell <S%G4098>down<s%>, and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, have <S%G3114>patience<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>. worshipped him: or, besought him

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G2962>lord<s%> of <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%>, and <S%G630>loosed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>forgave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G1156>debt<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%>, and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservants<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3784>owed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>pence<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he laid <S%G2902>hands<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>, and took him by the <S%G4155>throat<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G591>Pay<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3748>that<s%> thou <S%G3784>owest<s%>. pence: the Roman penny is the eighth part of an ounce, which after five shillings the ounce is seven pence halfpenny; about fourteen cents

<S%G3767>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservant<s%> fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>, and <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Have <S%G3114>patience<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>, <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G3739><s%> he should <S%G591>pay<s%> the <S%G3784>debt<s%>.

<S%G1161>So<s%> when <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservants<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> what was <S%G1096>done<s%>, they were <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G3076>sorry<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G1285>told<s%> unto <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that was <S%G1096>done<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%>, after that he had <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, O thou <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%>, I <S%G863>forgave<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3782>debt<s%>, <S%G1893>because<s%> thou <S%G3870>desiredst<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>:

<S%G1163>Shouldest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> have had <S%G1653>compassion<s%> on <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservant<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> had <S%G1653>pity<s%> on <S%G4571>thee<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> was <S%G3710>wroth<s%>, and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to the <S%G930>tormentors<s%>, <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G3739><s%> he should <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that was <S%G3784>due<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3779>So<s%> likewise shall <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3362>if<s%> ye <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G3362>not<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3900>trespasses<s%>.
